dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2925983D] COPYRIGHT INFRINGIMENT
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, February 05, 2007 12:05 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2925983D] COPYRIGHT INFRINGIMENT ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. COPYRIGHT INFRINGIMENT Added by system at Monday, Feb 5 2007 05:58 am X-MailFrom: gorgeous_belle22@yahoo.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Feb 5 05:57:55 2007 Received: (qmail 24135 invoked by alias); 5 Feb 2007 11:57:55 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 24132 invoked from network); 5 Feb 2007 11:57:55 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 5 Feb 2007 11:57:55 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 5 Feb 2007 05:57:55 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 05 Feb 2007 05:57:55 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from gorgeous_belle22@yahoo.co.uk) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HE2Tr-0003JP-3x for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 05 Feb 2007 05:57:55 -0600 Received: from web28110.mail.ukl.yahoo.com ([217.146.182.130]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from gorgeous_belle22@yahoo.co.uk) with smtp (Exim) id 1HE2Tp-00082H-Pm for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 05 Feb 2007 05:57:54 -0600 Received: (qmail 64590 invoked by uid 60001); 5 Feb 2007 11:57:51 -0000 DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=s1024; d=yahoo.co.uk; h=Message-ID:X-YMail-OSG:Received:Date:From:Subject:To:MIME-Version:Cont ent-Type:Content-Transfer-Encoding; b=dSzX5bSzh/KBzqwP6mz2fJ8lSHTWS2/LFKXgXkVE/dfijg+6hmjza9trNt/87SXFEJoLxs qAbiLhR76bsfrfK9TyStHB+9/4fAkkGab31FBRtc9X91Y+NXvORHoctw19qsh6UGagQmuQhT rb417rGJG3P22ZqnDoP6Y0B5CTgcI= ; Message-ID: <20070205115751.64585.qmail@web28110.mail.ukl.yahoo.com> X-YMail-OSG: FcIMhtwVM1meg0INX9LuXjQP2l.KO2gAzu.YLtk6cXGZSvx8lFYqQZtHMXqIUfPk13iT7oFu ZQS.ujKZwU6mqXUJySmIZ8uU28dVFV4MZAuZGgHpB1M- Received: from [82.33.61.114] by web28110.mail.ukl.yahoo.com via HTTP; Mon, 05 Feb 2007 11:57:51 GMT Date: Mon, 5 Feb 2007 11:57:51 +0000 (GMT) From: Isabelle Garcia Subject: COPYRIGHT INFRINGIMENT To: admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-514438518-1170676671=:64279" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Feb 2007 11:57:55.0288 (UTC) FILETIME=[DF049580:01C7491C] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Abuse team, The site modelsescort.com currently have pictures on the page below which ARE NOT AUTHORIZED TO BE USED ON THIS SITE: http://www.modelsescort.com/en/detail.php?siteid=196 All of those pictures belong to me, they are my pictures and having those associated to an escort website can have a devastating impact to my personal life. I have tried emailing the escort agency however I haven't received a reply. I tried to contact the number advertised on the site but the number is disconnected: +44 77066 96317 Please ensure the above page is removed ASAP. Regards, Isabelle --------------------------------- To help you stay safe and secure online, we've developed the all new Yahoo! Security Centre. MIME element (text/html)
Dear Abuse team,
 
The site modelsescort.com currently have pictures on the page below which ARE NOT AUTHORIZED TO BE USED ON THIS SITE:
 
http://www.modelsescort.com/en/detail .php?siteid=196
 
All of those pictures belong to me, they are my pictures and having those associated to an escort website can have a devastating impact to my personal life.
 
I have tried emailing the escort agency however I haven't received a reply.
 
I tried to contact the number advertised on the site but the number is disconnected:
 
+44 77066 96317
 
Please ensure the above page is removed ASAP.
 
Regards,
 
Isabelle
